refnamediv.refpurpose: displays information about Card OS-based security tokens

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The cardos-info utility is used to display information about smart cards and similar security tokens based on Siemens Card/OS M4.

listitem.para: Display information about the token in reader number number. The default is reader 0.
Use the card driver specified by name. The default is to auto-detect the correct card driver.
Causes cardos-info to wait for the token to be inserted into reader.
Causes cardos-info to be more verbose. Specify this flag several times to enable debug output in the opensc library.
